author: markt
msg: Don't rely on the platform default encoding being suitable to parse the session ID

author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Simon Hutchinson "Shipping Options are not showing correct currency symbol." (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-2971) - OFBIZ-2971
During "Step 3: Shipping Options" of the one page checkout the available options are displayed as options in a select box.
The description of the option includes a currency symbol. - However this symbol is always a $.
